description:
Tackle trails in style. On full days with a chance of hiking, the Escalon’s keep you feeling as good as you look. Indyeva’s signature tailored profile is combined with a technical fabric that helps protect you from the elements.

  • Nylon blend is durable, warm, and stretchy
  • Woven outer later blocks wind, while the soft inner layer holds in warmth
  • DWR finish helps shake off light rain and keeps your pants looking cleaner, longer
  • Comfortable high-waisted design has a trim elongated silhouette
  • Zippered thigh and left hand pockets, and standard left side pocket, giving you plenty of space to keep the day’s necessities close
name: Indyeva Escalon Pants - Women's
